name: Fennel and Orange Bluefish Grilled With Tomatoes, Potatoes and Fennel
keywords: bluefish, fennel, red potato, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 fennel bulbs, trimmed and halved lengthwise

recipeInstructions.text: Start a charcoal grill. Meanwhile, bring a large pot of water to the boil. Add the potatoes and cook for 15 minutes. Add the fennel and cook for 5 minutes longer. Drain. Cut the potatoes in half.

Rub the flesh of the bluefish with the garlic oil. Sprinkle with the orange zest, then the fennel seeds, mustard seeds, 1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste. Let the coals burn down so that the fire is quite low.

Place the fish on the grill, skin side down. Place the potatoes, fennel and tomatoes on the grill, cut side down. Cover the grill and cook for 25 minutes, or until the fish is cooked through and the vegetables are tender.

Cut the fish in half lengthwise. Cut again crosswise, making roughly equal pieces. Place 1 piece of fish, 1/2 tomato, 1 piece of fennel and 2 pieces of potato on each of 4 plates and serve immediately.
